Question & Options:
Which characters are involved in the events surrounding Hercules' journey in *The Legend of Hercules*?
Options:
A. Amphitryon
B. Hercules
C. Nemean Lion
D. All of the above

What actions did Amphitryon take against Hercules in the context of the military campaign?
Options:
A. Amphitryon sent Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt.
B. Hercules used his gods-given name to conceal his identity.
C. Hercules fought mercenaries with a lightning sword.
D. Amphitryon was trying to eliminate Hercules.

What actions were taken by Amphitryon in relation to Hercules in *The Legend of Hercules*?
Options:
A. Amphitryon sent Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt.
B. Hercules used his gods-given name to conceal his identity.
C. Hercules nearly defeated Amphitryon in combat.
D. Amphitryon was Hercules' father.
Correct Answer: Amphitryon sent Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt. Hercules used his gods-given name to conceal his identity. Hercules nearly defeated Amphitryon in combat.

Question & Options:
What actions did Amphitryon and Hercules take against each other in the story of *The Legend of Hercules*?
Options:
A. Amphitryon tried to eliminate Hercules by sending him on a military campaign.
B. Hercules concealed his identity using his gods-given name.
C. Hercules avenged Alcmene's death by killing Amphitryon.
D. Amphitryon helped Hercules in his military campaign.
Correct Answer: Amphitryon tried to eliminate Hercules by sending him on a military campaign. Hercules avenged Alcmene's death by killing Amphitryon.

Question & Options:
What actions did Amphitryon take against Hercules in their conflict?
Options:
A. Hercules nearly defeats Amphitryon in personal combat.
B. Amphitryon sends Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt.
C. Hercules uses his gods-given name to conceal his identity.
D. Hercules and Amphitryon become allies after their conflict.
Correct Answer: Hercules nearly defeats Amphitryon in personal combat. & Amphitryon sends Hercules on a military campaign in Egypt.
